name: Wreckerbot
description:
Warning: This game is shit

Watch out for the black blocks!

Controls since I couldnt think of anything else to type here:

(Default)

Move with arrows

Z to do a hammer attack

X to do a "knockup"

Hammer attack controls: Press the hammer key to aim

 Your aim goes to the mouse

Press the hammer key again to launch the hammer

 Knockup controls: Press the knockup key to knockup

Game heavily inspired by Blasting Bad which is heavily inspired by Wrecking Crew, and Starbot 4 

Play Blasting Bad! You'll have a blast! https://ug32t.itch.io/blasting-bad
